summary: “That Force does not belong to the Jedi.”
title: “That Force does not belong to the Jedi.”
body: The power of a force user doesn’t come from blood. It comes from experiences, through pain, through triumph, through life. Yes some are born more powerful in the force than others but the answer has never been as simple as blood.  It’s so much more… It is the force.

reblog.comment: The power of a force user doesn’t come from blood. It comes from experiences, through pain, through triumph, through life. Yes some are born more powerful in the force than others but the answer has never been as simple as blood.  It’s so much more… It is the force.

trail.content_raw: The power of a force user doesn’t come from blood. It comes from experiences, through pain, through triumph, through life. Yes some are born more powerful in the force than others but the answer has never been as simple as blood.  It’s so much more… It is the force.

blog.name: blorg2

blog.description: Where I'm putting the cool non-Next Gen stuff I spot.

summary: On the 4th day of Christmas... This is several Christmases worth of Star Wars Lego. Considering how expensive it is, I made a...
caption:
On the 4th day of Christmas…

This is several Christmases worth of Star Wars Lego. Considering how expensive it is, I made a decision only to collect sets from Episode V, and what you can see is only a fraction of that.

Expensive it might be, but there’s something very therapeutic about building Lego sets. 

I’m hoping to pick up the big Cloud City one this year (if I get enough Lego vouchers), so I will be dismantling what you see in the picture to make room for it, with the aim to reconstructed it for Christmas next year, so I should get my money’s worth over the years.

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

blog.name: swpromptsandasks
blog.title: StarWars prompts and asks
blog.description: Send me your best (weird, nsfw and cute) prompts and asks for Star wars and if they contain Obi-Wan then hurray for me. Lets see what we can drum up. (I don't write for the last trilogy, apologies)

tags: yeah there's no hiding it with Ani
summary: BelongToMe: What happens when Anakin and Obi-Wan are back at the Temple, do they make there intention to Mate clear and that...
question: BelongToMe: What happens when Anakin and Obi-Wan are back at the Temple, do they make there intention to Mate clear and that they will not be swayed? Or is it going to be hush-hush?
answer:
Shadowing the other man closely as they disembarked the transport they had to take from their public ship arrival to the temple, Anakin held onto Obi-Wan’s hand without an ounce of shame in him even as Obi-Wan’s ears and neck colored a delicate pink.

But Obi-Wan was shyer about this so Anakin didn’t mind as long as Obi-Wan wasn’t trying to hide their intentions.

That Obi-Wan belonged to Anakin.

No wait, that wasn’t right.

That they belonged to each other, yes that was better. Belonging to each other, alpha and omega, loved and beloved and mates to be as soon as Obi-Wan’s true heat hit and not the fake pseudo heat the pollen had activated in the others body.

So far no one had really seemed to notice that Obi-Wan was holding Anakin’s hand through the temple halls but they would be noticed eventually and the information would spread through the temple Anakin knew.

That Obi-Wan was taking an alpha finally and that it was Anakin who got to keep the omega and got to belong to each other.

Anakin almost couldn’t wait, wanted to shout at the top of his lungs so everyone would see them and know it.

But he refrained.

News would spread and soon enough Obi-Wan’s heat would come and until then Anakin would have to settle for spreading his scent on Obi-Wan’s clothes and holding him close in public. Or well, closer, Anakin had always been clingy, especially after he presented as an alpha.

So he fully expected the disappointed gazes of several council members when they arrived, Obi-Wan refusing to let go and Anakin only to happy to show off the newfound relationship with his older omega.

What he did not expect was the slightly envious, longing gaze Mace Windu couldn’t quite hide as he gazed at their hands.

On some level Anakin had always been aware that Windu was an omega, it was hard to ignore after all after heat season, stuck in the room with sweetened omega scents and all but…

For some reason Anakin had just assumed the man wasn’t interest in any sort of relationship.

Just a cold fish as some might say.

But going by that gaze, Mace Windu wasn’t as cold as he seemed to be, wanted things he ‘shouldn’t’ want according to the council. But if that gaze was anything to go by, there was more than just Depa who were chaffing at the council’s own words as she had been quite vocal in arguing with the others about omega and alpha relationships.

Shoulders hunched, Obi-Wan took it all in but didn’t let go of Anakin at all and when they finally got to go he shifted into Anakin’s arms with a pleading look on his face. Wrapping his arms around the other without much more prompting, Anakin nosed his omega slowly.

“Its gonna be alright Obi-Wan, they can’t stop us. They can’t really do anything against us to but disapprove and… they don’t have that much say, not in this.” Anakin murmured soothingly, nuzzling slowly and gently to assure the other man.

And it was working, Obi-Wan’s body was slowly relaxing into him as he settled his head on Anakin’s shoulder while breathing out heavily. “Right. They can’t really do anything but disapprove…” He agreed quietly and then smiled a bit at Anakin when the blond rubbed along his spine slowly. “Lets head to our quarters, I for one want to get my boots off and eat.” He said, voice still quiet but stronger.

Nodding eagerly, Anakin latched onto the others hand and pulled him to the elevator, eager to get some grub… and to speak about Obi-Wan’s next incoming heat.

reblog.comment:
Shadowing the other man closely as they disembarked the transport they had to take from their public ship arrival to the temple, Anakin held onto Obi-Wan’s hand without an ounce of shame in him even as Obi-Wan’s ears and neck colored a delicate pink.

But Obi-Wan was shyer about this so Anakin didn’t mind as long as Obi-Wan wasn’t trying to hide their intentions.

That Obi-Wan belonged to Anakin.

No wait, that wasn’t right.

That they belonged to each other, yes that was better. Belonging to each other, alpha and omega, loved and beloved and mates to be as soon as Obi-Wan’s true heat hit and not the fake pseudo heat the pollen had activated in the others body.

So far no one had really seemed to notice that Obi-Wan was holding Anakin’s hand through the temple halls but they would be noticed eventually and the information would spread through the temple Anakin knew.

That Obi-Wan was taking an alpha finally and that it was Anakin who got to keep the omega and got to belong to each other.

Anakin almost couldn’t wait, wanted to shout at the top of his lungs so everyone would see them and know it.

But he refrained.

News would spread and soon enough Obi-Wan’s heat would come and until then Anakin would have to settle for spreading his scent on Obi-Wan’s clothes and holding him close in public. Or well, closer, Anakin had always been clingy, especially after he presented as an alpha.

So he fully expected the disappointed gazes of several council members when they arrived, Obi-Wan refusing to let go and Anakin only to happy to show off the newfound relationship with his older omega.

What he did not expect was the slightly envious, longing gaze Mace Windu couldn’t quite hide as he gazed at their hands.

On some level Anakin had always been aware that Windu was an omega, it was hard to ignore after all after heat season, stuck in the room with sweetened omega scents and all but…

For some reason Anakin had just assumed the man wasn’t interest in any sort of relationship.

Just a cold fish as some might say.

But going by that gaze, Mace Windu wasn’t as cold as he seemed to be, wanted things he ‘shouldn’t’ want according to the council. But if that gaze was anything to go by, there was more than just Depa who were chaffing at the council’s own words as she had been quite vocal in arguing with the others about omega and alpha relationships.

Shoulders hunched, Obi-Wan took it all in but didn’t let go of Anakin at all and when they finally got to go he shifted into Anakin’s arms with a pleading look on his face. Wrapping his arms around the other without much more prompting, Anakin nosed his omega slowly.

“Its gonna be alright Obi-Wan, they can’t stop us. They can’t really do anything against us to but disapprove and… they don’t have that much say, not in this.” Anakin murmured soothingly, nuzzling slowly and gently to assure the other man.

And it was working, Obi-Wan’s body was slowly relaxing into him as he settled his head on Anakin’s shoulder while breathing out heavily. “Right. They can’t really do anything but disapprove…” He agreed quietly and then smiled a bit at Anakin when the blond rubbed along his spine slowly. “Lets head to our quarters, I for one want to get my boots off and eat.” He said, voice still quiet but stronger.

Nodding eagerly, Anakin latched onto the others hand and pulled him to the elevator, eager to get some grub… and to speak about Obi-Wan’s next incoming heat.

blog.name: swpromptsandasks
blog.title: StarWars prompts and asks
blog.description: Send me your best (weird, nsfw and cute) prompts and asks for Star wars and if they contain Obi-Wan then hurray for me. Lets see what we can drum up. (I don't write for the last trilogy, apologies)

summary: For #OldAndSweet: I'm loving Ben's interactions with his younger self, Anakin, and Padme. But I'm wondering about his reactions...
question: For #OldAndSweet: I'm loving Ben's interactions with his younger self, Anakin, and Padme. But I'm wondering about his reactions to everyone else? Does he tell his friends on the Council he missed them? Does he cry when he sees Jedi younglings? Does he freak out at troopers in white armor?
answer:
Grunting in surprise as someone dropped into his lap, Mace felt his eyes fly open and eyebrows fly up his forehead before chuckling quietly as Ben settled his head on the master’s shoulder and closed his eyes. “Let me guess, Skywalker and Obi-Wan are bickering?” He teased gently as he settled as comfortable as he could.

So far Ben was a fresh breeze of air in the war, shaking things up by just… being.

Because Ben was just sweet and cuddly of nature and had a tendency to sit in the lap of Mace at least or sit as close as he could to others. It kind of depended how they reacted to Ben and clearly Ben and Mace had a good friendship in the future just as Obi-Wan and Mace had a good friendship now.

To the point where Ben was quite confidant in dropping into Mace lap for attention in some kind of manner when Skywalker and Obi-Wan were otherwise preoccupied. Just like now, Ben obviously having tracked Mace down to his meditation in one of the meditation gardens.

His question was meet with a soft hum and Ben rubbing his cheek into Mace shoulder. “No, sparring with Ahsoka, she needs the training.” He yawned then smiled happily, Mace able to feel the others lips barely touching his neck.

It tickled a bit with the soft white beard and Mace struggled not to outright giggle as he shifted his hands up to pet Ben’s hair, giving up on his meditation as he pulled out his comm to check the clock. “Seems to be around lunch time, have you eaten Ben?”

“No, food sounds nice and a cup of tea.” Ben added hopefully and beamed when Mace snorted in amusement, the older man struggling to his feet with creaking joints.

Though he was moving better than when he arrived, the healers having done their fair job with medication and treatments which now improved the quality of Ben’s life.

And made them look at Obi-Wan closely.

Mace had heard some mutters about ‘genetically predisposed’ and something about early treatments to prevent things but he wasn’t sure what that was all about.

But that didn’t matter at the moment as he got up and took Ben with him to one of the closets refractories, knowing they could pick up some nice tea there and some decent food.

He wasn’t even surprised when Ben slipped his hand into Mace, just accepting the situation as he lead the older man.

The healers had been quick to caution anyone that interacted with Ben on a regular time basis that Ben sought after connection and physical contact and to further aid Ben in cementing himself in their time they shouldn’t shun that contact.

So holding onto Ben’s hand it was.

And it wasn’t like Ben forced the attention on someone who didn’t want it, he had yet to do anything of the sorts to Shaak or Evan as neither were of the touchy kind and he clearly was aware of that on some level.

But Mace, Depa, Plo, Obi-Wan, Skywalker and even Kit would often find their hand captured by the older man if he walked with them.

“I see Shaak, are we going to eat with her?” Ben asked, blinking at one of the tables and a quick glance confirmed the other councilors position, the togruta waving them over.

“Indeed, she seems open to that. Lets get our trays and we can go sit with her.” Mace rumbled, taking Ben to the food and quickly grabbing two to hand one over to the other.

Tray in hand, Ben smiled happily at him, reminding Mace that he wasn’t as old as he seemed as he was Force addled.

It was a very young, kind smile.

blog.name: medlilove
blog.title: Medlilove
blog.description: Just a nerd that draws Fan Arts. Account accidentally deleted so alot of this is older stuff re uploaded, thank you for the support!

summary: “We cast a shadow on something wherever we stand, and it is no good moving from place to place to save things; because the...
caption:
“We cast a shadow on something wherever we stand, and it is no good moving from place to place to save things; because the shadow always follows. Choose a place where you won’t do harm - yes, choose a place where you won’t do very much harm, and stand in it for all you are worth, facing the sunshine.”

― E.M. Forster, A Room with a View

blog.name: ao3feed--reylo
blog.title: Reylo AO3 Feed
blog.description:
This blog automatically posts links to AO3 fics containing the Rey/Kylo Ren tag.
Avatar by @panda-capuccino

summary: The Moon Danced and the Stars Played a Symphony
title: The Moon Danced and the Stars Played a Symphony
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2BKJVY1

by ELISE_ELEVEN

Ben Solo, renowned concert violinist, knows nothing but a glamourous life full of all fancy clothes, private planes, adoring fans, and women who want him. He has been on tour for several months now, and his last stop is the city he grew up in. After years of distance and avoidance, Ben will finally have to revisit his parents and accompanying uncomfortable memories.
He has planned to give his concert, see his parents, and get out as quickly as possible. But, on a stormy winter evening, Ben stumbles upon something that changes his perspective. Something stirs inside him and he beings to wonder if he can ever remember the passion he once had for his art. The beautiful, young dancer may be the only one who can teach him how to live again.

Words: 6138, Chapters: 2/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Star Wars - All Media Types, Star Wars Sequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Explicit
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Kylo Ren, Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Ben Solo, Rey (Star Wars), Leia Organa, Han Solo, Luke Skywalker, Rose Tico, Finn (Star Wars), Poe Dameron, Chewbacca (Star Wars), R2-D2 (Star Wars), C-3PO (Star Wars), Kaydel Ko Connix, Maz Kanata, Armitage Hux, Snoke (Star Wars), Phasma (Star Wars), BB-8 (Star Wars), Unkar Plutt
  • Relationships: Kylo Ren/Rey, Rey/Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Rey & Ben Solo | Kylo Ren, Rey/Ben Solo, Rey & Ben Solo, Finn/Rose Tico, Leia Organa/Han Solo
  • Additional Tags: Romantic Fluff, Alternate Universe - Modern Setting, Modern Era, Fluff and Angst, Light Angst, Eventual Smut, Fluff and Smut, Enemies to Lovers, Established Relationship, Masturbation, Vaginal Sex, Sexy Times, First Kiss, First Meetings, Meet the Family, Chance Meetings, Alternate Universe - Dance, violinist ben solo, Dancer Rey (Star Wars), Slow Burn, Porn With Plot, Alternate Universe - Romantic Comedy, Christmas Fluff, Christmas Eve, Ben Solo Needs A Hug, Rich Ben Solo, rich leia, Musical Instruments, POV Ben Solo, How Do I Tag, I’m Bad At Tagging, I’m Bad At Summaries, Passion, Plot


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2BKJVY1

by ELISE_ELEVEN

Ben Solo, renowned concert violinist, knows nothing but a glamourous life full of all fancy clothes, private planes, adoring fans, and women who want him. He has been on tour for several months now, and his last stop is the city he grew up in. After years of distance and avoidance, Ben will finally have to revisit his parents and accompanying uncomfortable memories.
He has planned to give his concert, see his parents, and get out as quickly as possible. But, on a stormy winter evening, Ben stumbles upon something that changes his perspective. Something stirs inside him and he beings to wonder if he can ever remember the passion he once had for his art. The beautiful, young dancer may be the only one who can teach him how to live again.
